channel.title: Account Deletion Request
channel.description:
Hello,
I used to use your wonderful community a long time ago (under the name dragonfire455) around the time when I was 15.
I've always loved your community and how you managed to build it into what it is today.
I won't lie, I was a kid and I acted hella retarded. That's no excuse, however it is for that reason I humbly request that my account and my posts be purged from your site.
I don't have access to my old email (dragonfire455@yahoo.com) but is there any way you could help me? I know it has been a long time, but I would just like to be forgotten. I hope you understand where I'm coming from, and that you have a wonderful day.
Thank you.

item.title: Account Deletion Request
item.dc:creator: @Anal_beads Anal beads
